rules_text:
Whenever this creature transforms into Lachesis, Striking Princess, tap up to one target creature.
[i]Leading Charm[/i] – Other Knights you control get +1/+1.
[i]Roses Counted[/i] – At the beginning of each end step, you gain 1 life for each spell cast this turn.
[i]Striking Position[/i] – Whenever you gain life, Lachesis deals 1 damage to target opponent.
